mutants.code:
def extract_secret_message(s: str) -> str:
    parts = s.split('')
    filtered_parts = [part for part in parts if part]
    secret_message = ' '.join(filtered_parts)
    return secret_message

def extract_secret_message(s: str) -> str:
    parts = s.split('LIE')
    filtered_parts = [part for part in parts if part]
    secret_message = ''.join(filtered_parts)
    return secret_message
